trans-unit.source: The Java tab of the Tomcat configuration dialog

seg-source.mrk: The Java tab of the Tomcat configuration dialog

target.mrk: Das Java-Tab in Tomcats Konfigurationsdialog

trans-unit.source: Configuring Tomcat

seg-source.mrk: Configuring Tomcat

target.mrk: Tomcat konfigurieren

trans-unit.source: This section will point the configuration options that are required to run Workflow Accelerator. However, Tomcat offers more configuration options that can be found in the official documentation:

seg-source.mrk: This section will point the configuration options that are required to run Workflow Accelerator.
However, Tomcat offers more configuration options that can be found in the official documentation:

target.mrk: Dieser Abschnitt beschreibt die Konfigurationseinstellungen, die notwendig sind, um Workflow Accelerator auszuführen.
Weitere Einstellungen, die Sie eventuell vornehmen möchten, finden Sie hier:

trans-unit.source: https://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-8.5-doc/

seg-source.mrk: https://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-8.5-doc/

target.mrk: http://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-8.5-doc/

trans-unit.source: Java options

seg-source.mrk: Java options

target.mrk: Java-Optionen

trans-unit.source: There are some Java options that need to be configured before starting the Tomcat server. These options are configured using the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">JAVA_OPTS</kbd> environment variable. It should contain the following values:

seg-source.mrk: There are some Java options that need to be configured before starting the Tomcat server.
These options are configured using the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">JAVA_OPTS</kbd> environment variable.
It should contain the following values:

target.mrk: Es müssen einige Java-Optionen konfiguriert werden, bevor Tomcat gestartet wird.
Diese Optionen werden über die <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">JAVA_OPTS</kbd> Umgebungsvariable konfiguriert.
Die folgenden Werte sollten enthalten sein:

trans-unit.source: -Xms1536m

seg-source.mrk: -Xms1536m

target.mrk: -Xms1536m

trans-unit.source: minimum RAM, should be at least 1.5GB

seg-source.mrk: minimum RAM, should be at least 1.5GB

target.mrk: minimaler RAM, sollte mindestens 1.5GB betragen

trans-unit.source: -Xmx2048m

seg-source.mrk: -Xmx2048m

target.mrk: -Xmx2048m

trans-unit.source: maximum RAM, should be at least 2GB but more is recommended

seg-source.mrk: maximum RAM, should be at least 2GB but more is recommended

target.mrk: maximaler RAM, sollte mindestens 2 GB betragen, mehr ist jedoch empfehlenswert

trans-unit.source: -Dfile.encoding=UTF-8

seg-source.mrk: -Dfile.encoding=UTF-8

target.mrk: -Dfile.encoding=UTF-8

trans-unit.source: sets UTF-8 as Apache Tomcat’s default encoding mechanism

seg-source.mrk: sets UTF-8 as Apache Tomcat’s default encoding mechanism

target.mrk: setzt UTF-8 als den Standard-Encodingsmechanismus von Apache Tomcat

trans-unit.source: -XX:PermSize=128m

seg-source.mrk: -XX:PermSize=128m

target.mrk: -XX:PermSize=128m

trans-unit.source: initial permanent generation space in MB

seg-source.mrk: initial permanent generation space in MB

target.mrk: initialer “Permanent Generation Space” in MB

trans-unit.source: -XX:MaxPermSize=256m

seg-source.mrk: -XX:MaxPermSize=256m

target.mrk: -XX:MaxPermSize=256m

trans-unit.source: maximum permanent generation space in MB

seg-source.mrk: maximum permanent generation space in MB

target.mrk: maximaler “Permanent Generation Space” in MB

trans-unit.source: In order to allocate sufficient RAM to the Tomcat server you have to set the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">Xms</kbd> and <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">Xmx</kbd> options, followed by the number of MB allocated and a literal <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">m</kbd>. <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">Xms</kbd> defines the initial/minimum amount of RAM that is used and <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">Xmx</kbd> the allowed maximum. You are advised to allocate at least 2GB of RAM to the Tomcat. However, it is recommended to use more RAM. For example, if you want to assign 4GB of maximum RAM the option would be <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"> -Xmx4096m</kbd>.

seg-source.mrk: In order to allocate sufficient RAM to the Tomcat server you have to set the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">Xms</kbd> and <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">Xmx</kbd> options, followed by the number of MB allocated and a literal <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">m</kbd>.
<kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">Xms</kbd> defines the initial/minimum amount of RAM that is used and <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">Xmx</kbd> the allowed maximum.
You are advised to allocate at least 2GB of RAM to the Tomcat.
However, it is recommended to use more RAM.
For example, if you want to assign 4GB of maximum RAM the option would be <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"> -Xmx4096m</kbd>.

target.mrk: Um ausreichend RAM für Tomcat zur Verfügung zu stellen, müssen die <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">Xms</kbd> und <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">Xmx</kbd> -Optionen gesetzt werden, gefolgt von der MB-Anzahl und dem Buchstaben <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">m</kbd>.
<kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">Xms</kbd> definiert den minimalen RAM, <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">Xmx</kbd> den maximalen RAM.
Wenn Sie z.B. 4 GB maximalen RAM zuweisen möchten, würde die Option wie folgt aussehen: <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">-Xmx4096m</kbd>

alt-trans.seg-source: You are advised to allocate at least 2GB of RAM to the Tomcat. However, it is recommended to use more RAM.
alt-trans.target: Es sollten mindestens 2 GB RAM zugewiesen werden, mehr ist jedoch empfehlenswert.

trans-unit.source: The values for the permanent generation space have to be increased as well, these are defined by the values <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"> -XX:PermSize=128m </kbd> and <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"> -XX:MaxPermSize=256m</kbd>.

seg-source.mrk: The values for the permanent generation space have to be increased as well, these are defined by the values <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"> -XX:PermSize=128m </kbd> and <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"> -XX:MaxPermSize=256m</kbd>.

target.mrk: Zudem müssen die Werte für den “Permanent Generation Space” erhöht werden.Hierfür sind die Variablen <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">-XX:PermSize=128m</kbd> und <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">-XX:MaxPermSize=256m</kbd> zu setzen.

trans-unit.source: Windows

seg-source.mrk: Windows

target.mrk: Windows

trans-unit.source: If you installed Tomcat using the Windows service installer, you can open the configuration dialog by opening the Windows start menu and selecting <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" /><kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">Program Files\Apache Tomcat\Configure Tomcat</kbd>

seg-source.mrk: If you installed Tomcat using the Windows service installer, you can open the configuration dialog by opening the Windows start menu and selecting <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" /><kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">Program Files\Apache Tomcat\Configure Tomcat</kbd>

target.mrk: Falls Sie Tomcat über den Windows Installer installiert haben, öffnen Sie nun den Konfigurationsdialog über das Startmenü und <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" /><kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">Programme\\Apache Tomcat\\Configure Tomcat``\\ </kbd>.

trans-unit.source: The Java tab offers the possibility to set the options and define the memory pool (minimum and maximum RAM usage). Fill in the values for Xms and Xmx into the fields for memory pool and add the other options to the text area labeled as Java Options.

seg-source.mrk: The Java tab offers the possibility to set the options and define the memory pool (minimum and maximum RAM usage).
Fill in the values for Xms and Xmx into the fields for memory pool and add the other options to the text area labeled as Java Options.

target.mrk: Im Java-Tab können Sie nun die entsprechenden Optionen setzen.
Minimale und maximale RAM-Zuweisung werden unter “Initial memory pool” und “Maximum memory pool” definiert. Fügen Sie die verbleibenden Option in das Textfeld “Java Options” ein.

trans-unit.source: Debian

seg-source.mrk: Debian

target.mrk: Debian

trans-unit.source: One way to define the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">JAVA_OPTS</kbd> under Debian and other Linux distributions is to create the file <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">setenv.sh</kbd> in the Tomcat <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">/bin/</kbd> directory. This directory contains also other files like the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">catalina.sh</kbd>, the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">startup.sh</kbd> or the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">shutdown.sh</kbd> und is for instance located in <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">/usr/share/tomcat8</kbd> or a similar directory. Create or extend any existing setenv.sh file and add the line for the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">JAVA_OPTS</kbd>:

seg-source.mrk: One way to define the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">JAVA_OPTS</kbd> under Debian and other Linux distributions is to create the file <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">setenv.sh</kbd> in the Tomcat <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">/bin/</kbd> directory.

This directory contains also other files like the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">catalina.sh</kbd>, the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">startup.sh</kbd> or the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">shutdown.sh</kbd> und is for instance located in <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">/usr/share/tomcat8</kbd> or a similar directory.
Create or extend any existing setenv.sh file and add the line for the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">JAVA_OPTS</kbd>:

target.mrk: Unter Debian und anderen Linux-Distributionen können die <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">JAVA_OPTS</kbd> gesetzt werden, indem Sie die Datei <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">setenv.sh</kbd> im Verzeichnis Tomcat <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">/bin/</kbd> erstellen.

In diesem Verzeichnis befinden sich zudem Datein wie <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">catalina.sh</kbd> , <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">startup.sh</kbd> und <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">shutdown.sh</kbd> und der Pfad ist zum Beispiel <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">/usr/share/tomcat8</kbd> oder vergleichbar.
Erstellen Sie die Datei setenv.sh (oder öffnen Sie die bestehende Datei) und fügen Sie eine Zeile für die <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">JAVA_OPTS</kbd> hinzu:

trans-unit.source: In case you have created a new <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">setenv.sh</kbd> file, you have to make sure it is executable using the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">chmod</kbd> command:

seg-source.mrk: In case you have created a new <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">setenv.sh</kbd> file, you have to make sure it is executable using the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">chmod</kbd> command:

target.mrk: Wenn Sie eine neue <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">setenv.sh</kbd>-Datei erstellt haben, müssen Sie diese noch ausführbar machen.Verwenden Sie hierfür den <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">chmod</kbd>-Befehl:

trans-unit.source: Set up the Tomcat connector

seg-source.mrk: Set up the Tomcat connector

target.mrk: Erstellen des Tomcat Connectors

trans-unit.source: By default the Tomcat server will start up using port 8080 and 8005. Port 8080 is used for serving the Workflow Accelerator web application. Port 8005 is used to shut down the Tomcat instance. You can change the port in the server.xml which is located in <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_HOME/conf/server.xml</kbd>.

seg-source.mrk: By default the Tomcat server will start up using port 8080 and 8005.
Port 8080 is used for serving the Workflow Accelerator web application.
Port 8005 is used to shut down the Tomcat instance.
You can change the port in the server.xml which is located in <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_HOME/conf/server.xml</kbd>.

target.mrk: Die Ports können in der Datei server.xml geändert werden, die im Verzeichnis <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_HOME/conf/server.xml</kbd> zu finden ist.

trans-unit.source: If the server is running on any other port than port 80, your users will have to enter the port in the address line of the web browser, e.g. <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">http://workflow.yourdomain.com:8080/</kbd>.

seg-source.mrk: If the server is running on any other port than port 80, your users will have to enter the port in the address line of the web browser, e.g. <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">http://workflow.yourdomain.com:8080/</kbd>.

target.mrk: Falls der Webserver auf einen anderen Port als Port 80 läuft, muss der Port in der Adressleiste des Browsers referenziert werden, zum Beispiel wie in: <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">http://workflow.yourdomain.com:8080/</kbd>.

trans-unit.source: Locate the HTTP connector and change the value of port to your preferred port. Furthermore, make sure the connector contains the entry <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">URIEnconding="UTF-8"</kbd>. For example, the connector could look like this:

seg-source.mrk: Locate the HTTP connector and change the value of port to your preferred port.
Furthermore, make sure the connector contains the entry <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">URIEnconding="UTF-8"</kbd>.
For example, the connector could look like this:

target.mrk: Machen Sie den HTTP Connector in der server.xml-Datei ausfindig und passen Sie den Wert für den Port wenn nötig an.
Stellen Sie zudem sicher, dass der Connector den Eintrag <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">URIEnconding="UTF-8"</kbd> enthält.
Der Connector könnte z.B. so aussehen:
